detailsData.title: Free Initial Consultation
detailsData.content: Loscalzo & Loscalzo, P.C. offers a free initial consultation to examine the facts of your case and provide a legal opinion.

detailsData.title: Personal Service
detailsData.content: If you are unable to visit their offices, a representative from Loscalzo & Loscalzo, P.C. can meet with you in your home, business, or hospital.

detailsData.title: Direct Attorney Access
detailsData.content: Loscalzo & Loscalzo, P.C. assigns one attorney to handle your case from start to finish, ensuring personal attention and continual service.

detailsData.title: Spanish Language Services
detailsData.content: Loscalzo & Loscalzo, P.C. can communicate in Spanish over the telephone, in meetings, and by letter to accommodate more clients.

valueProp: Loscalzo & Loscalzo, P.C. is an injury law firm dedicated to helping accident victims in Manhattan and throughout New York. For over 50 years we have been committed to representing our clients and helping them move forward after an accident or injury. We take great pride in what we do, and always devote 100% of our time, energy, and resources into securing a favorable recovery. Contact our skilled Manhattan personal injury lawyers today and see how we can help you.
